extensions.name: Always togglable menu
extensions.author: nicofrand
extensions.description: This makes the icon to toggle the menu always shown, even on larger screens.

extensions.name: Auto Refresh
extensions.author: Essa AlAwadi
extensions.description: Automatically refreshes the RSS feed when there is no activity

extensions.name: AutoTTL
extensions.author: Magnus Kokk
extensions.description: A FreshRSS extension for automatic feed refresh TTL based on the average frequency of entries.

extensions.name: Black List
extensions.author: CNTools | Clemens Neubauer
extensions.description: Blacklist to block feeds for users

extensions.name: Clickable Links
extensions.author: Kapdap
extensions.description: Replaces non-clickable plain text URLs found in articles with clickable HTML links.

extensions.name: Colorful List
extensions.author: Claud Xiao
extensions.description: Colorful Entry Title based on RSS source

extensions.name: Comics in feed
extensions.author: José Moreira
extensions.description: Embed the images from comics feeds directly.

extensions.name: Copy2Clipboard
extensions.author: CNTools | Clemens Neubauer
extensions.description: Copy the destination links of all visible entries into clipboard

extensions.name: Custom CSS
extensions.author: Marien Fressinaud
extensions.description: Give possibility to overwrite the CSS with a user-specific rules.

extensions.name: Custom JS
extensions.author: Frans de Jonge
extensions.description: Apply custom JS.

extensions.name: Date Format
extensions.author: Alexis Degrugillier
extensions.description: Change how dates are displayed in the interface

extensions.name: Feed Priority Shortcut
extensions.author: Aidi Stan
extensions.description: Set up visibilities/priorities of your feeds easily

extensions.name: FeedTitleBuilder
extensions.author: CNTools | Clemens Neubauer
extensions.description: Build your own feed title based on url, the original feed title and the date the feed was added

extensions.name: FilterTitle
extensions.author: CNTools | Clemens Neubauer
extensions.description: Filter feed entries by filter keywords in title

extensions.name: Fixed Nav Menu
extensions.author: Marco Heizmann
extensions.description: Sets the position of the navigation menu to fixed when scrolling down.

extensions.name: FreshRss FlareSolverr
extensions.author: James Ravenscroft
extensions.description: Use a Flaresolverr instance to bypass cloudflare security checks

extensions.name: GReader Redate
extensions.author: Julien Avérous
extensions.description: Use published date instead of fetching date.

extensions.name: Image Cache
extensions.author: Victrid
extensions.description: Cache feed images on your own facility or Cloudflare cache.

extensions.name: Image Proxy
extensions.author: Frans de Jonge
extensions.description: No insecure content warnings or disappearing images.

extensions.name: Invidious Video Feed
extensions.author: Korbak (forked from Kevin Papst)
extensions.description: Embed YouTube feeds inside article content, but with Invidious.

extensions.name: Invidious Video Feed
extensions.author: Paul Tunbridge (forked from Korbak and Kevin Papst)
extensions.description: Embed YouTube feeds inside article content, but with Invidious.

extensions.name: Kagi Summarizer
extensions.author: Rudis Muiznieks
extensions.description: Add buttons to summarize articles with the Kagi Universal Summarizer.

extensions.name: Keep Folder State
extensions.author: Marco Heizmann
extensions.description: Stores the state of the folders locally and expand them automatically if necessary.

extensions.name: LaTeX support
extensions.author: Alexis Degrugillier
extensions.description: Add support for LaTeX notation rendering

extensions.name: Mark Previous as Read
extensions.author: kalvn
extensions.description: This extension adds a button in the footer of each entry. Clicking this button will mark all previous entries belonging to the current feed, as read. The goal is, when going through a very long list of entries without reading them all, to be able to stop and continue later.

extensions.name: Mobile Scroll Menu
extensions.author: Marco Heizmann
extensions.description: Automatically hides the header menu on mobile phones, when scrolling down and shows it when scrolling up.

extensions.name: News Assistant
extensions.author: Mervyn Zhan
extensions.description: Using the ai api of `OpenAI`, `Anthropic`, `Groq` by [Portkey-AI/gateway](https://github.com/Portkey-AI/gateway/) to summary the news.

extensions.name: Pocket Button
extensions.author: Christian Putzke
extensions.description: Add articles to Pocket with one simple button click or a keyboard shortcut.

extensions.name: Quick Collapse
extensions.author: romibi and Marien Fressinaud
extensions.description: Quickly change from folded to unfolded articles

extensions.name: RSS-Bridge
extensions.author: Devon Hess
extensions.description: Run URLs through RSS-Bridge detection.

extensions.name: Readable
extensions.author: printfuck
extensions.description: Fetch article content for selected feeds with readability or mercury

extensions.name: Reading Time
extensions.author: Lapineige
extensions.description: Add a reading time estimation next to each article title

extensions.name: ReadingTime
extensions.author: Lapineige
extensions.description: Add a reading time estimation next to each article

extensions.name: Reddit Image
extensions.author: Alexis Degrugillier
extensions.description: Modify reddit entries by displaying known medias and easing access to the linked resource

extensions.name: Remove emojis
extensions.author: CNTools | Clemens Neubauer
extensions.description: remove emojis in the title of newly added feed entries

extensions.name: Share By Email
extensions.author: Marien Fressinaud
extensions.description: Improve the sharing by email system.

extensions.name: ShowFeedID
extensions.author: math-GH
extensions.description: Show the ID of feed and category

extensions.name: Smart Mobile Menu
extensions.author: Marco Heizmann
extensions.description: Minimizes the required button space and groups buttons.

extensions.name: Sticky Feeds
extensions.author: Marien Fressinaud
extensions.description: Set the feed aside in the main stream following the window scroll.

extensions.name: Theme Mode Synchronizer
extensions.author: Aidi Stan
extensions.description: Synchronize the theme with your system light/dark mode

extensions.name: ThreePanesView
extensions.author: nicofrand
extensions.description: Adds a third vertical pane along the articles list, to display the articles content.

extensions.name: TinyTinyRSS API
extensions.author: Marien Fressinaud
extensions.description: Provides an API compliant with TinyTinyRSS applications.

extensions.name: Title-Wrap
extensions.author: ₣rans de Jonge, Joris Kinable
extensions.description: Applies a line-wrap to long article titles, as opposed to truncating the title when it overflows its display area.

extensions.name: Touch Control
extensions.author: Marco Heizmann
extensions.description: Add touch gestures to FreshRSS.

extensions.name: TranslateTitlesCN
extensions.description: Translate article titles of the specified feed into Chinese, using DeepLX or Google Translate.
extensions.author: jacob2826

extensions.name: TwitchChannel2RssFeed
extensions.author: Babico
extensions.description: Transfer Twitch Channel URL into RSS Feed URL.

extensions.name: White List
extensions.author: Alexis Degrugillier
extensions.description: White list the accessible feeds to users

extensions.name: YouTube Video Feed
extensions.author: Kevin Papst
extensions.description: Embed YouTube feeds inside article content.

extensions.name: YouTubeChannel2RssFeed
extensions.author: CNTools | Clemens Neubauer
extensions.description: Transfer YouTube URL into RSS Feed URL.
